document_data.mainbody:
Andover Heights was a small mountain range located on the island of Snowdown within the Moonshae Isles.
The mountain range stretched for roughly , running north to south along Snowdowns western coast with the Straight of Alaron. An unnamed forest and several lakes, including the Harloch, Mal Feargal, and Mal Sul, were found along the base of the eastern slopes. The inhabitants of the island also constructed several mines within Andover Heights.
